 2018-01622018-02-21,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of SUSAN JANE KNOTT of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective April 10, 2018.
